description.@en: I’m no coward—I am just adept at avoiding the worst of situations . . . particularly when they’re delivered at the end of a musket.

system.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Coordination Tests to Defend against attacks made with ranged weapons.
